name: Orange Rolls
ingredients: 1 cup scalded milk 1/4 cup orange juice
steps: Combine melted butter, sugar, and orange peel into bowl dip rolls into mixture and place in greased muffin tin
allow to rise for about 4 hours. Bake at 350 for 10-­‐15 minutes or until lightly browned. Glaze while warm.
Glaze: 1 cup powder sugar, 2 Tablespoons butter (softened), 2 Tablespoons of fresh orange juice (from the orange)
½ cup shortening 2 Tbsp grated orange peel
Dissolve yeast in warm water and a little sugar. Combine milk, shortening, sugar and salt in bowl. Cool a bit.
Add yeast. Add everything else but the flour and beat well. Add flour and mix. Let rise for 10 min. Knead 5-­‐10
minutes on lightly floured surface. Place in greased bowl. Cover with damp cloth and rise for 2 hours. Punch
down and rise for 15 minutes. Roll out. Place on greased sheet cake pan and let rise. Bake at 400 for 12 minutes.
Icing: 2 Tbsp Orange Juice, 1 tsp grated orange peel, 1 cup powdered sugar
